message.content:
cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SE, cs.SY

Reasoning: 
1. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper proposes a new architecture for mobile cloud computing that involves Software Defined Networking (SDN) and efficient communication connections between different endpoints. 
2. cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) - The proposed architecture involves distributed cloudlets and a Cloudlet Network File System (CNFS) to protect Avatars' dataset against hardware failure and improve performance. 
3. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The CNFS is designed based on the proposed architecture to improve data access latency. 
4. cs.SE (Software Engineering) - The paper discusses the design of the proposed architecture and the CNFS. 
5. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper proposes a green energy supplement to reduce operational expenditure and CO2 footprint incurred by running the distributed cloudlets, which involves designing an optimal green energy management strategy.
